title: Fun Cross-Cultural Exchange
detail_text: <:th_ch0208/>Waaah, it looks good on you, You-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>R-, really? Traditional Swiss clothing is really cute, huh. The embroidery and beadwork are amazing, and this fluffy apron is lovely too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>It’s called a Tracht.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Hey, Emma-san. I’d like you to wear some traditional Japanese clothing too, so....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Kimonos!? I love Kimonos!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Nope, sailor uniforms! Sailor uniforms are also a proper part of traditional Japanese clothing, Emma-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Eh, really....? I didn’t know that.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>They actually are.... Though not many knew about it. I want you to try some of my recommended uniforms!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Okay! I’m looking forward to seeing what kind of uniforms there are~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Fufufu.... Don’t worry, I have lots!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
